author: Petra Cahill
title: U.S suffers deadliest day of coronavirus pandemic yet, as Wuhan lockdown lifted - NBC News
description: U.S suffers deadliest day of coronavirus pandemic yet, as Wuhan lockdown lifted NBC News Coronavirus live updates: U.S. deaths near 13,000 as Wuhan lifts lockdown NBC News View Full Coverage on Google News
content:
Good morning, NBC News readers.
The United States suffered its deadliest day of the coronavirus pandemic yet on Tuesday, just as the Chinese city where the illness was first reported finally lifted its lockdown. And a musical legend has been lost to the viru… [+7042 chars]
